question: Hello Dr'I am 65 year old man with lot of desire to have sex with my wife, even though i now have high blood pressure for last 15 years and diabetes for last 12 years.I used to have perfect sex life till 6 months back with all the medicine i take. I used to have sex minimum twice a week in afternoon after lunch, but now my sex desire is same but what ever i may do my penis remains flabby. Could somebody help me. I am ready for any treatment so long as they donot have illeffect on me.
title: erecticle dysfunction
